bill.title: Driver's licenses; authorize public school driver's education instructors to conduct driving tests in lieu of license examiner.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 37-25-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize Driver Education Instructors In The Public Schools To Officially Test The Driving Skills Of Students Completing A Public School Driver Training And Education Program; To Amend Section 63-1-33, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize Department Of Public Safety License Examiners To Accept The Results Of Such Public School Driving Skills Tests In Lieu Of Conducting Skills Tests With Applicants For An Operator's License Or Temporary Driving Permit; To Amend Section 63-1-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity To The Provisions Of This Act; And For Related Purposes.
